Uses of Package
io.atomix.resource

  • Packages that use io.atomix.resource 
    Package Description
    io.atomix
    Core Atomix APIs, including ResourceClient and io.atomix.manager.ResourceReplica.
    io.atomix.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and io.atomix.coordination.DistributedLeaderElection, and DistributedMembershipGroup.
    io.atomix.messaging
    Provides distributed messaging resources such as DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging, and DistributedTaskQueue for asynchronous processing.
    io.atomix.resource
    Provides classes and interfaces for creating and operating on Raft replicated state machines.
    io.atomix.variables
    Provides distributed variables such as DistributedValue and DistributedLong.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix 
    Class and Description
    Resource
    Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.
    Resource.Options
    Resource options.
    ResourceType
    Resource type.
    ResourceTypeResolver
    The resource type resolver is responsible for locating resource types.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix.collections 
    Class and Description

    Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.

    Class and Description
    Configurable
    Interface for configurable resources.
    ConfigurableResource
    Base class for configurable resources.
    Consistency
    Resource consistency constraints.
    Instance
    Resource instance.
    Instance.Method
    Instance open method.
    InstanceOperation
    Resource operation.
    Resource
    Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.
    Resource.Config
    Resource configuration.
    Resource.Options
    Resource options.
    Resource.State
    Indicates the state of the resource's communication with the cluster.
    ResourceFactory
    Resource factory.
    ResourceOperation
    Resource operation.
    ResourceRegistry

    ResourceStateMachine
